action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Jack,

Ok sure, no problems. Confirming this is done and here is the link:
> https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/botox-but-not-as-you-know-it <https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/botox-but-not-as-you-know-it>

If they send you a link to an online version, we can link off to that too. In the meantime, we have added it as an image with a click to download the full article.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
